subject: Ponzi and Pyramid Schemes
Suits and Litigation
Baseball
lead_paragraph: To the court-appointed trustee suing the co-owners of the Mets, the Madoff “vig” was evidence of the men’s faith in Madoff’s steady investment returns, and their dependence on them.
